item.title: Odd Api Design: loadOptions prop in async React Select
item.description: react-select/async has a loadOptions prop that helps you filter and display options based on some input string. The function you pass to loadOptions has two ways to set the options to display. This is what caused an unexpected (to me) issue. This isn’t a sneaky bug since I caught the issue while developing.
